==Investigation and trial of the police officers==
==Investigation and trial of the police officers==
â
The investigation into Saeed's death yielded 300 papers, analysis and testimony which informed the decision to charge both police officers, Mahmoud Salah Mahmoud and Awad Ismael Suleiman, in criminal court with use of violence and unjustified detention of the victim.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/55686 |title=exclusive: Khaled Saeed case investigation | Al-Masry Al-Youm: Today's News from Egypt |publisher=Al-Masry Al-Youm |date= |accessdate=2011-03-23}}</ref> They were detained in July 2010,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/53178 |title=2 Alex policemen detained in Khaled Saeed case | Al-Masry Al-Youm: Today's News from Egypt |publisher=Al-Masry Al-Youm |date=2010-06-30 |accessdate=2011-03-23}}</ref> and the trial began in July but was postponed and did not resume until February 2011. <ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/302734 |title=Alexandriaâs Khaled Saeed police brutality trial postponed | Al-Masry Al-Youm: Today's News from Egypt |publisher=Al-Masry Al-Youm |date=2011-01-22 |accessdate=2011-03-23}}</ref> The Alexandria Criminal Court will announce on June 30 the verdict on the case.<ref>[http://www.thedailynewsegypt.com/crime-a-accidents/court-verdict-in-khaled-saeid-case-slated-for-june-30-dp2.html The Daily News Egypt May 22, 2011: Court verdict in Khaled Saeid case slated for June 30]</ref>
+
The investigation into Saeed's death yielded 300 papers, analysis and testimony which informed the decision to charge both police officers, Mahmoud Salah Mahmoud and Awad Ismael Suleiman, in criminal court with use of violence and unjustified detention of the victim.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/55686 |title=exclusive: Khaled Saeed case investigation | Al-Masry Al-Youm: Today's News from Egypt |publisher=Al-Masry Al-Youm |date= |accessdate=2011-03-23}}</ref> They were detained in July 2010,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/53178 |title=2 Alex policemen detained in Khaled Saeed case | Al-Masry Al-Youm: Today's News from Egypt |publisher=Al-Masry Al-Youm |date=2010-06-30 |accessdate=2011-03-23}}</ref> and the trial began in July but was postponed and did not resume until February 2011. <ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/302734 |title=Alexandriaâs Khaled Saeed police brutality trial postponed | Al-Masry Al-Youm: Today's News from Egypt |publisher=Al-Masry Al-Youm |date=2011-01-22 |accessdate=2011-03-23}}</ref> The Alexandria Criminal Court will announce on June 30 the verdict on the case.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.thedailynewsegypt.com/crime-a-accidents/court-verdict-in-khaled-saeid-case-slated-for-june-30-dp2.html |title=The Daily News Egypt May 22, 2011: Court verdict in Khaled Saeid case slated for June 30 |publisher=Thedailynewsegypt.com |date= |accessdate=2011-05-27}}</ref>
